name: woocommerce-log-file-search
title: WooCommerce Log File Search
description: Search WooCommerce log files for matching content.

scripts.build-zip: npm run build && mkdir ./woocommerce-log-file-search && cp -r ./woocommerce-log-file-search.php ./rwoocommerce-log-file-search/woocommerce-log-file-search.php && cp -r ./includes ./woocommerce-log-file-search/includes && cp -r ./build ./woocommerce-log-file-search/build && zip -r ./woocommerce-log-file-search.zip ./woocommerce-log-file-search && rm -r ./woocommerce-log-file-search
